thread.section_title: Clubhouse Golf Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clubhousegolf.co.uk
thread.title: Andy Scott
thread.title_full: Clubhouse Golf reviewed by Andy Scott

author: Andy Scott
title: Andy Scott
text: I always order my golf 'gear' from clubhouse golf. Whether that may be clothing or clubs. They are best on prices and their delivery and customer service is first class. They also have on their website a chat facility where you can chat to a Pro about any of the stock. I would certainly recommend them.
